title: Ghosts of London
description: 'There are worse things than being dead.'The Ghosts of London – the most dangerous gang in the city – are going hunting for human flesh across the lawless, urban wasteland that has arisen from the ashes of the old metropolis.If you’re out there – hide, hope and wait for the sun to rise. Pray that the Ghosts don’t find you.Because there are worse things than being dead.Ghosts of London is a nail-bitingly tense, fast-paced dystopian thriller set in an alternate London. It is the third book in The Future of London series.
author: Mark  Gillespie
